attributes.action: Ban all advertising for fossil fuels in public places.
attributes.additional_details: I think that large oil and gas companies should not be allowed to share their greenwashing campaigns in public spaces such as public transport and billboards.
attributes.background: Advertising for fossil fuels should be banned in public places. Just like adverts for tobacco, it is time that greenwashing on behalf of large oil and gas companies comes to an end - it is now or never to act on the climate emergency.
